Text:
@ dollfin

If you post Bengali movies in a regular basis, I'm the only one person who will be very much thankful to you ! have a nice journey in uploading !

@ robin5555

 i wish i cud have, but the problem is i cannot due to schedule,..but will try surely

but u r so fast...nd efficient nd as u know.. we are a little..lazy.( jokhan onnyo keu korchey sudhu sudhu khete r ki hobey..?)

i aapreciate u r work..but dont xpect any appreciation from the leechers as..they r bunch of..dumbo's

thnx for the interaction by the way

Thanks dollfin!! Will come up with the A/V rating soon!!!
Btw, Do u have any plans of uploading Shatru and Urochithi??
P.S. All leechers are not dumbos!! ;)

@ dollfin

sure bro, you must up that releases my pressure also ! and if you wanna up a movie, then please write it to my last post, i'll not up that movie ! bhalo theko ar antoto maje maje up koro ! thanks a lot ! i know how hard your uploading job is !
